name: Farmers Fight (rivershen)
description:
Part of my solo dev "Game a Week" challenge. The randomly generated game idea for this was: "A sci-fi adventure game that takes place during a terrible disaster, where you play as a group of charming farmers who want to avert the end of the world".

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Cycle through formations (6 total)

"R" - Restart

Alt + F4 - Quit

Kill all of the eggs to win!

Feedback would be greatly appreciated!
